content: Professional qualification in SingaporeThis article **relies largely or entirely on a single source**. Relevant discussion may be found on the talk page. Please help improve this article by introducing citations to additional sources. *Find sources:* "Chartered Accountant of Singapore" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(May 2021)* **Chartered Accountant of Singapore** is a professional [accounting](/wiki/Accountancy) qualification in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). Candidates who successfully complete the *Singapore Qualification Programme* in Accounting are eligible to register as Chartered Accountants of Singapore under the Singapore Accountancy Commission Act 2013. This accounting-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Chartered Accountant of Singapore
